content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ if you loved the simple & best sock pattern 1 let s step it up with a little colorwork these vine colorwork crochet socks are satisfying to work up love the look of knit stitches but only crochet these socks use unique crochet stitches to mimic the knit and purl stitches it also creates a flexible and comfortable fabric for this pattern using fingering weight yarn really lets this stitch show off its definition with an amazing drape **video tutorial ** https //youtu be/6wrcht3ljtc 2 **crochet hook ** 2 5 & 3 5 mm crochet hooks 3 or size to obtain gauge **notions ** removable stitch markers if needed 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 **yarn ** wecrochet stroll 7 in solid or tweed 75% fine superwash merino wool 25% nylon 462 yds/100g **yardage ** colorways treasure color a rainstorm heather color b mid calf socks 375yds/343m - 2 skeins of main color 1 skein accent color **abbreviations/stitches ** blo - back loop only chain - chain est st pat - established stitch pattern round - round single_crochet - single_crochet ssc - split single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es **gauge ** 20 sts x 25 row = 4x4 inches in established stitch pattern see notes the stitches per inch is 5 **skill level ** intermediate **size/measurements ** the simple sock video tutorial and the written pattern will follow an example sock for stitch counts this example sock will fit a foot circumference of 8 inches however adjust these as needed a sock schematic is available in the pattern get the free downloadable charts here https //brianakdesigns com/how-to-size-crochet-socks/ 8 this pattern is available on the blog for free let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 9 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 10 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 11 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 12 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 13 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 14 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2020 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner you are welcome to sell finished items all patterns are copyrighted please do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern in any way all photographs in listing and patterns are not to be used for the sale of your item 1 https //brianakdesigns com/simple-best-sock-pattern/ 2 https //youtu
